queryDetail.sqlQuery:
DECLARE @drSubclientId int = 1 SELECT TOP 1 @drSubclientId = id FROM APP_Application (NOLOCK) WHERE appTypeId= 1000
DECLARE @defaultInstanceId INT = 1 SELECT TOP 1 @defaultInstanceId = id FROM APP_InstanceName (NOLOCK) WHERE name = 'DefaultInstanceName'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT opType,CASE opType WHEN 4 then 'Data management' WHEN 5 then 'Data recovery' WHEN 13 then 'Aux Copy' WHEN 11 then 'Disaster Recovery Backup' WHEN 10 then 'Archive Prune' WHEN 9 then 'Media Recycle' WHEN 14 then 'Synthetic Full' WHEN 1 then 'All Activity' WHEN 28 then 'Schedule' WHEN 57 then 'Content Indexing' WHEN 53 then 'Offline Content Indexing' WHEN 100 then 'Deduplication Database activity' WHEN 31 then 'Data Verification' END +' has been disabled' as OutputCol FROM JMJobAction (NOLOCK) WHERE clientId=1 AND mediaAgentID=1 AND appType=0 AND instanceID=@defaultInstanceId AND appId=@drSubclientId AND action=1 AND clientGroupId=0 ) T WHERE LEN(OutputCol)>=20
queryDetail.queryDescription: Alert to notify if activity at commcell level is disable
